title: Making PCBs
summary:
Why Bother? So, why would anyone bother making PCBs at home? The truth is that not many people do any more. In the year 2025, we have the ability to order high quality PCBs form China for next to nothing. If you just want a high quality board and you don’t mind waiting a week or two, these are a great option.
I however, don’t like to wait. I want a PCB in my hands the same day I finish the design.
